Alexa.NoIntentHandled: I couldnt understand you, can you try again or say help to know what can you ask me.
Alexa.Help:
You can say where is [device name]. 
Or what is the last location of [device name]

DeviceIntent.CantFindLocation: Sorry we cant find last location of
DeviceIntent.SlotNotFound: I couldnt found your device, please can you reapeat your finder device name ?
